text: Ferdinand Vega (30 April 1936 - 26 February 2021) was a Puerto Rican archer. He competed in the men's individual event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Vega was a Command Chief Master Sergeant in the Puerto Rico Air National Guard. He was born in Santurce, Puerto Rico. Vega died on 26 February 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican archers
title: Ferdinand Vega
